data.why:
I am modeling the controller code for the megasquirt
    (http://www.bgsoflex.com/megasquirt.html) fuel injection project in
    perl. The purpose is to provide code for a virtual MegaSquirt to use
    in conjunction with tuning applications. The general idea is to take
    datalogs from the unit and crunch them to suggest new fuel maps and
    expand from there. The code will be sturdy enough to support GUI's
    in the future.

    Thanks.
